name: Alchemy Arena
description:
Alchemy Arena is a local battle game on which alchemists fight each other controlling the elements around them and interacting with the arena.  

In this universe, transmutations are made using symbol sequences that allow the transformation of energy and matter. 

The alchemists also have Alchemy Stones on their hand to create special powers, knock opponents out and win the battle.

We will be releasing it soon. Keep in touch with us following our social media.
